definition: to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
"ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
to dawdle/the name of the father of the Emperor Yao
very early in the morning/in the wee hours
be high up in the sky
Lingyun county in Baise 百色[Bai3 se4], Guangxi
Lingyun county in Baise 百色[Bai3 se4], Guangxi
Lexus/see also 雷克薩斯|雷克萨斯[Lei2 ke4 sa4 si1]
stage name of Cyndi Wang/see 王君如[Wang2 Jun1 ru2]
Linghai county level city in Jinzhou 錦州|锦州, Liaoning

sentences.english: Jim told Ling Feng not to forget to change it water.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆告訴凌峯不要忘了給它換水。

sentences.english: Undulator oar, boating on the lake, Fun for all at.
sentences.chinese: 凌波盪槳，泛舟湖上，其樂無窮。

sentences.english: How many times we enjoyed ice-creams in the snow with warm fogs breathing out.
sentences.chinese: 曾幾何時，我們在雪天裏呼着熱氣喫冰淇凌。

sentences.english: Please don't eat too much ice-cream, it's bad for your health.
sentences.chinese: 不要喫太多的冷激凌，它對身體不好。

sentences.english: Ling Mengchu and Li Yu are all masters of NiHuaBen.
sentences.chinese: 凌濛初與李漁都是擬話本小說的大家。

sentences.english: They do not map directly onto each other.
sentences.chinese: 它倆的版圖並非直接凌於彼此上方。

sentences.english: Linfeng was drawing a horse on the black board when the teacher entered the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 老師走進教師時，凌峯正在黑板上畫馬。

sentences.english: Ling Feng made the baby stop crying.
sentences.chinese: 凌峯使嬰兒停止了啼哭。

sentences.english: Ministry of Education shows its determination to keep bully away from campus through the campaign of declaration.
sentences.chinese: 教育部透過宣示活動展現反霸凌決心。

sentences.english: Lin Feng was drawing a horse on the blackboard, when the teacher came in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 老師走進教室時，凌峯正在黑板上畫馬。

sentences.english: Shanghai Phonelink communication & technology co. LTD.
sentences.chinese: 上海風凌通訊技術有限公司。

sentences.english: How did Ling Feng make the baby stop crying ?
sentences.chinese: 凌峯怎樣使那個嬰兒不哭的？

sentences.english: Mr. Ling wants to see you.
sentences.chinese: 有位姓凌的先生要見您。

definition: a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people/two-character surname Murong
surname Ji/family name of the Zhou Dynasty 周代[Zhou1 dai4] (1046-256 BC)
old place name (in modern Linyi county 臨猗縣|临猗县, Shanxi)/two-character surname Linghu
surname Xue/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
surname Di/generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
